author.persName: Mirza I'tisam al-Din son of Shaikh Taj al-Din, resident in Tajpur.

msItem.title: Shigarf-namah-i Wilayat.
msItem.note: Front flyleaf, recto: a) Presented to the Royal Asiatic Society by James Burgess Esq MD JUne 1878 b) Signature in pencil: J Burgess c) Sgnature in ink: G Govan(?_) F149b: Impression of oval seal of Suchet Ray dated 1215, followed by an apologetic comment on his handwriting. Account of the author's journey to England in 1767 and his experiences there. Copied on the suggestion of Dr Govan(?). Headings and punctuation in red.
msItem.incipit: Sitayish wa niyayish malik al-mulki-ra sazad

origin.p: In the third watch of the day of the new moon Bhadon 1867 Samvat, 19 August A.D. 1811 and Jumada II A.H. 1226.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
